Project.Brief history of your project and organi: DeMed is a dedicated team specializing in medical data research and analysis. The team focus on collecting, processing, and applying healthcare-related datasets to support medical innovation and improve patient outcomes. Its expertise bridges data science and healthcare to enable impactful insights in the medical field.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: PubMed is a free search engine maintained by the U.S. National Library of Medicine, providing access to millions of biomedical and life sciences research articles. It includes citations and abstracts from MEDLINE, life science journals, and online books. Researchers, healthcare professionals, and students use it to find reliable scientific literature across medicine, biology, and related fields.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: The data will be prepared using some common tools and basic methods. We will clean and organize the data so it can be used properly. The process will involve standard steps without any special technical details.
